snippet.title: Asym Altered Axis - Alpha Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Here's a new Trailer for Asym Altered Axis!

Play with friends as Infiltrators, or play solo as the almighty Protector!
Each faction offers distinct and unique gameplay ranging from Stealth Action to Real-Time Strategy!!

Infiltrator
Build your team of up to 5 players and engage in unprecedented Stealth Action gameplay. With a variety of weapons and ultimates at your disposal, adapt to any situation - escape certain death, bolt into battle, or sneak in undected. Can you steal the Nexus from the Protector and make it back alive?

Protector
The Protector player has defend their world to keep Infiltrators at bay in unique Real-Time Strategy gameplay. With god-like powers allowing them to create anything, they must build an impenetrable fortress around their nexus using various concealed traps, faithful robot guard and their arsenal of almighty powers.

Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/18...

For updates and news on Asym Altered Axis, follow us on social media!

Discord: https://discord.gg/EC8cteB9u8
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AsymAlteredAxis
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AsymAlteredA...
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/asymaltered...
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@asymalteredaxis
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AsymAlteredA...

*Work in progress - Alpha 1 footage
